resume_professionnel: Decisive seasoned Bio-pharmaceutical sales representative who drives territory growth through creative and innovative marketing strategies. Skilled at analyzing market trends and customer needs to develop highly-effective and targeted campaigns to drive revenue.
competences_transversales: Relationship building with healthcare executives and KOLs

missions: Marketing and promoting CVD products to NYC CV, Endocrinology, and Nephrology specialists and hospitals.
Business Planning, Sales Forecasting and strong use of Excel.
Meeting and exceeding sales goals.
Built strong business relationships with healthcare executives and key opinion leaders.
Strong collaboration with internal partners.
Launched aggressive growth plans that helped increase customer base of Flumist from 15 to 94 customers in the geography in 3 years.
Presented PowerPoint presentation to Executive Leadership Team on customer segmentation strategy and customer returns strategy.
Resulting program increased volume sales by 1Million in 1 year.
Provided subject matter content to a sales module on successful selling in a hospital environment resulting in significant increase in Synagis revenue from hospital sales.

Created a project to increase sales team's collaboration using company's SharePoint Service to create a workspace for field use; worked with Effectiveness Team to roll out a similar platform using Box.com; program incorporated by Astra Zeneca.
Selected Accomplishments: Awards of Excellence 2007, 2008, 2009; Regional Market Events Think Tank Committee appointment 2009; Directors Award 2008; Zetia Product Advisory Committee Appointment 2008.
NYC Teaching Hospitals, NYC & NJ Pulmonologists.
8 hospital Formulary Placements and 3 hospital Protocol Implementations to achieve 115% to goal achievement and 140% to goal for new product launch.
Achieved and exceeded sales goals year over year throughout tenure.
Zithromax Product Advisory board appointments.

Promotion of key branded products to Internal Medicine, Pulmonologists, Cardiologists, Nephrologists, Allergists, Dermatologists, Psychiatrists, Geriatric Specialists, Neurologists, Otolaryngologists, and NYC Hospital Teaching Institutions.
Guest Regional and National Trainer Appointments.
Circle of Excellence Sales Award Trip Winner.
Rookie of the Year Award.
Regional Performance Fund Award for stepping into vacant Hospital Territory in district and driving sales.
Achieved and exceeded sales goals throughout tenure.
Multiple appointments to marketing product advisory boards due to achievements with field sales.
